Posts.Content: morning. i attend a fitness class in edinburgh and out teacher 'jill' has been going thru what you are - last november she started treatment and a few weeks ago we all broke the world record zumbathon! with her:-) . she is now in great health and her moto was be around people who are positive and have a healthy mind - positive mental attitude will get you thru it - remember to listen to your body and rest when you feel the need . i wish you all the best and a healthy future . hope this ecourages you to 'fight' and defeat! hugs . gill x
Posts.Title: Tired , wired and scared.
